package.name: Hatch Generator
package.description: A powerful parametric hatch generator that allows creating complex 2D hatch patterns on faces. Features include: - A large library of over 100 built-in patterns (geometric, fractal, material textures, etc.). - Support for using custom FreeCAD objects as patterns. - Multiple distribution modes: tiling, grid, radial, random, and more. - Extensive variation controls for randomization of scale, rotation, color, and spacing. - Parametric object that remains editable in the property view after creation. - Support for multiple base shapes, pattern shapes, and subtraction objects. - An optional 'scipy' dependency enables advanced Voronoi patterns.
